select * from ( select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY u.use_at desc, u.member_id, c.name) as rn, u.use_at, sum(u.mileage) as mileage, c.name, u.refund, LISTAGG(u.name, ', ') within group(order by u.name) as title, LISTAGG(u.id, ', ') within group(order by u.name) as us_ids from usage_history u, common_code c where u.place = c.id and u.member_id = #{memberId} and u.place = 'U01'
and u.use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and u.use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
group by u.use_at, u.member_id, c.name, u.refund order by u.use_at desc ) where rn> (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}

select count(count(id)) from usage_history where member_id = #{memberId} and place = 'U01'
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
group by use_at

select sum(sum(mileage)) from usage_history where member_id = #{memberId} and place = 'U01' and (refund = 'B01' or refund = 'B03')
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
group by use_at

select * from ( select rownum as rn, u.use_at, u.mileage, c.name, u.refund, u.id, u.name as pname from usage_history u, common_code c where u.place = c.id and u.member_id = #{memberId} and u.place = 'U02'
and u.use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and u.use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
order by u.use_at desc ) where rn> (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}

select count(id) from usage_history where member_id = #{memberId} and place = 'U02'
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1

select sum(mileage) from usage_history where member_id = #{memberId} and place = 'U02' and (refund = 'B01' or refund = 'B03')
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
